member.name: T:Common.Logging.NLog.CommonLoggingTarget
member.summary: Routes all log events logged through NLog into the Common.Logging infrastructure.
member.author: Erich Eichinger

member.name: M:Common.Logging.NLog.CommonLoggingTarget.#ctor
member.summary: Creates this target using the default layout.

member.name: M:Common.Logging.NLog.CommonLoggingTarget.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates this target using a custom layout.

member.name: M:Common.Logging.NLog.CommonLoggingTarget.Write(NLog.LogEventInfo)
member.summary: Writes the event to the Common.Logging infrastructure

member.name: T:Common.Logging.NLog.NLogLogger
member.summary: Concrete implementation of interface specific to NLog 1.0.0.505-2.0.
member.remarks: NLog is a .NET logging library designed with simplicity and flexibility in mind. http://www.nlog-project.org/
member.author: Bruno Baia

member.name: M:Common.Logging.NLog.NLogLogger.Trace(System.Action{Common.Logging.FormatMessageHandler})
member.summary: Log a message with the level using a callback to obtain the message

member.name: T:Common.Logging.NLog.NLogLoggerFactoryAdapter
member.summary: Concrete subclass of ILoggerFactoryAdapter specific to NLog 1.0.0.505.
member.remarks:
Note, that you cannot use NLog in medium trust environments unless you use an unsigned build The following configuration property values may be configured:
configType: INLINE|FILE
configFile: NLog XML configuration file path in case of FILE
The configType values have the following implications:
FILE: calls NLog.LogManager.Configuration = new NLog.Config.XmlLoggingConfiguration(configFile).
<any other value>: expects NLog to be configured externally
member.example:
The following snippet shows how to configure EntLib logging for Common.Logging:
<configuration> <configSections> <section name="logging" type="Common.Logging.ConfigurationSectionHandler, Common.Logging" /> </configSections> <common> <logging> <factoryAdapter type="Common.Logging.NLog.NLogLoggerFactoryAdapter, Common.Logging.NLog"> <arg key="configType" value="FILE" /> <arg key="configFile" value="~/nlog.config" /> </factoryAdapter> </logging> </common> </configuration>
member.author: Bruno Baia
Erich Eichinger

member.returns: The value or null if not found

member.returns: True if the variable is set
